languages.text: "Пощадите, молю всем, что осталось — пощадите моего друга!"

traits.locale_text: "Пощадите, молю всем, что осталось — пощадите моего друга!"

languages.text: "Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"
languages.original_text: "Пощадите, молю всем, что осталось — пощадите моего друга!"

traits.locale_text: "Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"
"Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"
"Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"
"Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"
"Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"

languages.text: 「彼を助けてください、私に残されているものすべてをもってお願いします！友達を助けてください！」
languages.original_text: "Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼を助けてください、私に残されているものすべてをもってお願いします！友達を助けてください！」

languages.text: « Épargnez-le, je vous en supplie, je vous donnerai tout ce que je possède ! Ne tuez pas mon ami ! »
languages.original_text: "Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"

traits.locale_text: « Épargnez-le, je vous en supplie, je vous donnerai tout ce que je possède ! Ne tuez pas mon ami ! »

languages.text: “饶了他吧！我用我仅存的一切乞求你，饶了我的朋友吧！”
languages.original_text: "Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"

traits.locale_text: “饶了他吧！我用我仅存的一切乞求你，饶了我的朋友吧！”

languages.text: «Perdónele la vida. Se lo ruego por lo que más quiera. ¡No mate a mi amigo!».
languages.original_text: "Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"

traits.locale_text: «Perdónele la vida. Se lo ruego por lo que más quiera. ¡No mate a mi amigo!».

languages.text: "Verschont ihn, ich flehe Euch mit allem an, was mir noch bleibt — verschont meinen Freund!"
languages.original_text: "Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"

traits.locale_text: "Verschont ihn, ich flehe Euch mit allem an, was mir noch bleibt — verschont meinen Freund!"

languages.text: "Kıymayın ona, her şeyimle size yalvarıyorum. Arkadaşıma kıymayın!"
languages.original_text: "Spare him, I am begging you with all that is still left — spare my friend!"

traits.locale_text: "Kıymayın ona, her şeyimle size yalvarıyorum. Arkadaşıma kıymayın!"
